channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- wildfly-security-manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- wildfly-security-manager

item.title: CVE-2019-14843|2024-08-05T00:26:39.115Z -- red%20hat -- wildfly-security-manager
item.description: A flaw was found in Wildfly Security Manager, running under JDK 11 or 8, that authorized requests for any requester. This flaw could be used by a malicious app deployed on the app server to access unauthorized information and possibly conduct further attacks. Versions shipped with Red Hat Jboss EAP 7 and Red Hat SSO 7 are vulnerable to this issue.
